Articles.Content:
Hey guys, after a lot of time, my Space shuttle is woking ! 

Kind of... I run KSP with Deadly Reentry and x6.4 Kerbin size, so coming back from space at 5.5 km/s is not easy ! 

So I'd like to know how can i edit the heat resistance of a part (only some of them, i don't want deadly reentry to be useless) 

Should i go in the Squad folder or the Deadly Reentry one ? 

The parts i need to improve are the Shielded docking port, Landing gears and Vernor engines.

Thank you for your replies guys, have a good day !

                                                                                                                                       Here is da BEAST
